change_role.from_customer: You are about to upgrade this userâ€™s role. The user may receive greater access to conversations, private conversation notes, user information and some configuration areas, depending on how your permissions are configured.

timeline.preamble:
Hello! This is the beginning of your {name} journey. Here you can see a log of every action they will take within Kayako. You can also display their activity from other programs, by pushing notifications to this timeline using Zapier or the Kayako API.

Oh, and you can add private notes to this journey, which your team can see, but the customer cannot. ðŸ‘‡
grant.you_have_not_authorized_apps: You have not authorized any apps to use your Kayako account.
grant.confirmdelete: Are you sure you want to revoke this app's access? The app will no longer be able to connect to your Kayako account.
avatar_removal_failure: Failed to remove your avatar. Please try again later or contact support.
confirm.delete_avatar.header: Are you sure you want to remove your avatar?
confirm.delete_avatar.body: We'll replace it with a default Kayako avatar.
incorrect_file_type: {filename} isn't allowed, please try again with a JPG, GIF, or PNG file.
two_factor.enable.title: Two-factor authentication
two_factor.enable.get_started: Add another layer of security to your Kayako account by requiring access to your phone whenever you log in. Once activated, you'll need to enter both your password and an authentication code from your mobile phone to log in to your Kayako account.
two_factor.enable.learn_more: Learn more about two-factor authentication in Kayako
two_factor.enable.get_app: You'll need an authenticator app on your mobile phone to generate your authentication codes.
two_factor.enable.recommended_apps: We recommend Google Authenticator, a free app available for most phones. Kayako also supports apps like Duo Mobile and Authy.
two_factor.enable.add_kayako: To add Kayako to your authenticator app, open the app and add a new token. Then, scan the image below, using your phone's camera.
two_factor.enable.enter_otp: After scanning the image, enter the 6-digit authentication code generated by the app in the box below.
two_factor.enable.success_description: All set! Doors securely locked and bolted. From now on, when you sign in to your Kayako account you'll need to enter an authentication code from your phone using your authenticator app as well as your regular password.
two_factor.enable.backup_codes: We've generated some backup authentication codes for you to keep in a safe place, just in case you lose access to your mobile phone.
two_factor.disable.headline: Are you sure you want to disable two-factor authentication?
two_factor.disable.subheading: Removing two-factor authentication will remove the additional layer of security on this account.
